data.message: Marshall please darling ..enough with the beard ..doesnt suit you at all,makes you look so much older..and your not..but i love how youre not blonde thank god..i prefer your natural hair colour,as you look younger and your eyes and features stand out..your a hottie don't make drama with that beared on ..youre lucky im in UK or ill shave it off myself..just cos its "fashion" doesn't mean follow ..you have such nice facial features..don't ruin it please ..admin please give him a good shake and the best razor..if i knew the address I'd send him one..😊

replies.message: Thanks for the like sweetie Katerina  ..but its right isnt it...he is so hot and good looking for his age ..which other men would kill for..considering all Marshall has been through..and he goes silent   for ages (photos wise ..we all are aware its an admin dealing with his page..duh..he -Marshall-is not into it ..technology)..lol..and then after holding our breaths ..he comes up with this..oh my days..i wish i was living in Detroit ..as I'd deliver the barber myself for Marshall..  😎
